name: Hourly Barbarg Log
query:
SELECT
    LPAD(hours.hour, 2, '0') AS hour,
    COUNT(bl.name) AS total_logs
FROM (
    SELECT 9 AS hour UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12 UNION ALL
    SELECT 13 UNION ALL SELECT 14 UNION ALL SELECT 15 UNION ALL SELECT 16 UNION ALL
    SELECT 17 UNION ALL SELECT 18 UNION ALL SELECT 19 UNION ALL SELECT 20
) AS hours
LEFT JOIN `tabBarbarg Log` bl
    ON HOUR(bl.creation) = hours.hour
    AND DATE(bl.creation) = CURDATE()
GROUP BY hours.hour
ORDER BY hours.hour;
